mapper.insert: insert into t_brand (id, brand_name, type_id, type, provider_id_fk, provider_name, provider_auth_level, aptitude_status, trademark_start_date, trademark_end_date, brand_introduce, trade_type, buckle_point, send_order_weight, trademark_register_start_date, trademark_register_end_date, producer_deal_start_date, producer_deal_end_date, health_certificate_start_date, health_certificate_end_date, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, removed) values (#{id}, #{brandName}, #{typeId}, #{type}, #{providerIdFk}, #{providerName}, #{providerAuthLevel}, #{aptitudeStatus}, #{trademarkStartDate}, #{trademarkEndDate}, #{brandIntroduce}, #{tradeType}, #{bucklePoint}, #{sendOrderWeight}, #{trademarkRegisterStartDate}, #{trademarkRegisterEndDate}, #{producerDealStartDate}, #{producerDealEndDate}, #{healthCertificateStartDate}, #{healthCertificateEndDate}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{removed})

insert into t_accessory_url (id, t_provider_fk, accessory_url, accessory_name, accessory_source, accessory_address, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, removed) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.tProviderFk}, #{item.accessoryUrl}, #{item.accessoryName}, #{item.accessorySource}, #{item.accessoryAddress}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedBy}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.removed})
